description: Numbers n whose binary expansion does not end in 001.
comments: Numbers less than 8 or not congruent to 1 (mod 8). - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 02 2013
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,1,-1).
mathematica: Join[Range[0, 3], Select[Range[4, 80], Take[IntegerDigits[#, 2], -3] != {0, 0, 1} &]]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 18 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
